description: Collects browser history, downloads, cookies, and bookmarks from Chrome, Edge, and Firefox. Safely queries SQLite copies using PSSQLite and emits NDJSON with a verification record, per-artifact entries, and a run summary. Supports overriding LookbackHours via Arg1 (default: 24 hours).

script_parameters.name: LookbackHours
script_parameters.description: Number of hours to look back when collecting browser history and artifacts. Default is 24 hours.
